Author: laura#6637
Content: I am from CITEX exchange, we received this email about updates, is it come from KMD official?

Author: laura#6637
Content:
Dear Citex team,

We want to remind that Komodo v0.5.0 (Obsidian Dragon) update goes live (activates) on December 20, at block 1,670,000 (approximately in 48 hours).

It's highly recommended to suspend KMD deposit/withdrawal operations between December 19th - 21st.

Author: laura#6637
Content: Komodo v0.5.0 (Obsidian Dragon) mandatory update is ready and available on GitHub : https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/tree/master - release: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/releases/tag/0.5.0

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is a precaution, just in case the hardupdate doesnt go smoothly. we are expecting it to go smoothly, but if the exchange wallets are closed, then even if it isnt smooth there wont be a way for people to take advantage of it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: height 1,670,000 is in about 900 blocks, as long as we get past it without any issues, then all is happy

Author: laura#6637
Content: Thank you, I will pass it over to our dev
